title: Dangerous Gamble (3C76)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Shadow: Spot a [Moria] minion to reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Add (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	“Almost they began to hope that they would escape.”
Rarity:	C
